name: HelpComponent

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: A custom icon. If not set, the navigator icon is resolved
inputsClass.description: A custom icon. If not set, the navigator icon is resolved

inputsClass.name: isCollapsed
inputsClass.rawdescription: Indicates if the help dialog is collapsed.
inputsClass.description: Indicates if the help dialog is collapsed.

inputsClass.name: priority
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The priority where the help icon should be shown in the action bar. "-Infinity" value means that priority
of this item is the lowest possible, so it will be placed at the right edge of action bar.
inputsClass.description: The priority where the help icon should be shown in the action bar. "-Infinity" value means that priority of this item is the lowest possible, so it will be placed at the right edge of action bar.

inputsClass.name: src
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The source of the documentation. Used to link to the documentation as well as
to parse the source to display.
inputsClass.description: The source of the documentation. Used to link to the documentation as well as to parse the source to display.

propertiesClass.name: hasError
propertiesClass.description: Indicates if the component failed loading the source.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Indicates if the component failed loading the source.

propertiesClass.name: isLoading
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Indicates if the component is loading.

propertiesClass.name: sectionContent
propertiesClass.description: The section content in the doc which is going to be displayed.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: The section content in the doc which is going to be displayed.

propertiesClass.name: sectionHeading
propertiesClass.description: The section heading in the doc which is going to be displayed.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: The section heading in the doc which is going to be displayed.

propertiesClass.name: showLangWarning
propertiesClass.description: Indicates if a warning should be shown.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Indicates if a warning should be shown.

propertiesClass.name: title
propertiesClass.description: A title. Set in open by passing the source.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A title. Set in open by passing the source.

methodsClass.name: getUrl
methodsClass.rawdescription: Builds the URL based on the src. The Base URL can be set in the application options docBaseUrl.
methodsClass.description: Builds the URL based on the src. The Base URL can be set in the application options docBaseUrl.

jsdoctags.comment: The source of the help on the guide.
This flag is used to call the index.json content of a guide. For example, "https://cumulocity.com/docs/cockpit/data-explorer/index.json".

methodsClass.name: toggle
methodsClass.rawdescription: Toggles the visibility of the help dialog.
methodsClass.description: Toggles the visibility of the help dialog.

description:
A component which shows a context help in the action bar.

Example :
<c8y-help src="/docs/cockpit/working-with-dashboards/#working-with-dashboards"></c8y-help>
rawdescription:
A component which shows a context help in
the action bar.

```html
<c8y-help src="/docs/cockpit/working-with-dashboards/#working-with-dashboards"></c8y-help>
```
